technologies.name: Biotechnology (focused on molecules and cells)
technologies.evidence: ATRO Medical’s artificial meniscus Artimis® replaces your meniscus. This means you will return to your daily activities, with heavy sports excluded, while reducing chronic pains: a flexible yet strong solution to your knee problems.

technologies.name: Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Data
technologies.evidence: The durable meniscus prosthesis of ATRO Medical will be designed in 3D based on artificial intelligence, developed by the Orthopaedic Research Lab.
